page.title: 09Events in Hampton in 1984
page.content: {FEBRUARY 4th}Wine and Cheese Evening. {MARCH 5th-8th}School Visit to York. {APRIL 2nd-6th}School Lent Appeal Week. {13th}Auction{26th-28th}Players Concert {MAY 3rd}Plant Sale.{12th}Jumble Sale {16th}Best Village Competition.{19th} Brownies Day{19th-20th}Art Exhibition. {JUNE 2nd}Garden Fete and Barbecue{9th} Sunday School Outing to Coombe Abbey. {23rd}School Sports Day{23rd}Barn Dance {JULY 7th}Chariot Race. {SEPTEMBER 8th}Horse Show and Half Marathon. {OCTOBER 5th}Harvest Supper. {NOVEMBER 24th}School Christmas Fair. {DECEMBER 1st}Manor Coffee Morning and Christmas Fair{7th}Hampton Community Crafts.{11th,12th,13th}School Christmas Concert.{18th}School Christmas Party.{19th}School Carol Service.
